body:
I have something like that in my code:
```
  train_indices = tf.random_uniform(
      [BATCH_SIZE], 0, num_train_samples, tf.int64)
  train_data_node = tf.gather(tf_train_data, train_indices)
  train_labels_node = tf.gather(tf_train_labels, train_indices)
```

This question is better asked on  [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) since it is not a  bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there. Thanks!
